value.title: Judge denies Omarosa Manigault Newman request to depose Trump, John Kelly in lawsuit
value.excerpt: A judge on Tuesday ruled that former Trump White House aide Omarosa Manigault Newman is not allowed to depose former President Trump or former Trump chief of staff John Kelly in a lawsuit relating to her White House departure in 2018.

value.title: Biden on US meeting looming Afghanistan withdrawal deadline: 'Could happen, but it is tough'
value.excerpt: President Joe Biden said he is still making a decision on withdrawing all US troops from Afghanistan ahead of a May 1 deadline set by former President Donald Trump, saying it "could happen, but it is tough."
